title: How to Make Vegan Mango Bubble Tea

steps.headline: Scoop out the flesh of one whole ripe mango and put it into a jar.
Add sugar or bubble tea syrup.
Add the soy milk or rice milk.
Add cooked tapioca pearls that have been soaking in bubble tea syrup.
Insert a big bubble tea straw.

text: Scoop out the flesh of one whole ripe mango and put it into a jar.  Add the coconut milk.  Add sugar or bubble tea syrup.  Add the soy milk or rice milk.  Add the ice.  Add cooked tapioca pearls that have been soaking in bubble tea syrup.  Insert a big bubble tea straw.  Finished.  Finished.
